title: REMAG: Recovering high-quality Eukaryotic genomes from complex metagenomes
description:
REMAG is a specialized metagenomic binning tool designed for recovering high-quality eukaryotic genomes from mixed prokaryotic-eukaryotic samples. It uses contrastive learning with Siamese neural networks to generate meaningful contig embeddings for clustering.

Key Features:

  • Bacterial filtering using 4CAC XGBoost classifier
  • Contrastive learning with Siamese neural networks
  • HDBSCAN clustering for genome binning
  • Quality assessment using eukaryotic core genes
  • Iterative refinement for contamination removal
